Divine

Unholy Protection

MA Ermor,  MA Sceleria

Combat

damage [damage]: 67108864

Bless/Buff: Magic Resistance
 
(Affects Demons and Undead [demonundead], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Demons [demonimmune])
With this prayer, an unholy priest grants magic resistance to a small number of undead beings. This extra magic resistance is very useful if the enemy has priests that can banish the undead.
